public class Move
extends java.lang.Object

Represents one component of the output of your AI: a list of moves to crush your enemies!

Constructor Detail

Move

public Move(Node from,
            Node to,
            int nbSoldiers)
Creates a new move. Attention: See the wiki for what is considered a valid move.

Parameters:
from - the starting Node that contains your soldiers.
to - the ending Node where you want to move your soldiers.
nbSoldiers - the number of soldiers you want to move.
